title: RP in PBE account
body:
I created a PBE account recently but i had 0 RP and 0 Blue essence  on it. 
i thought PBE accounts have unlimited RP.

replies.body: only 8k rp. Also it takes time to give it to you. Just be patient.
Mine (at least used to) get replenished every so often.  I don't know if they still do that though.
Y tho? Why would they have infinite RP and BE?
